title: Classification of Zones

zones.description: The area containing the sauna heater limited by:
limits: (i) The vertical plane 0.5 m from the external edge of the sauna heater.
(ii) The floor, or surface expected to be occupied by persons, and the cold side of the thermal insulation of the ceiling.
(i) The vertical plane limiting Zone 1 and the cold side of the thermal insulation of the walls of the sauna room or enclosure.
(ii) The floor, or surface expected to be occupied by persons, and the horizontal plane 1.0 m above the floor.
(i) The vertical plane limiting Zone 1 and the cold side of the thermal insulation of the walls of the sauna room or enclosure.
(ii) The horizontal plane 1.0 m above the floor and the cold side of the thermal insulation of the ceiling.

note: Zone 3 is directly above Zone 2. Examples of these zones are given in Figure 6.22.
